comments.author: Rob
comments.body: Dave U and I will be departing from the ATLAS loading dock at 12:00 sharp, see you there if you'd like to join us for a ride throught the country. RL

comments.author: Matt
comments.body: CULink and its weekly 1 p.m. meeting in the Computing Center will keep me from joining you today. My only time on two wheels will be the ride from Humanities to the CC via the Boulder Creek path. Rob, I'm sorry to report that your testimony in favor of $230 italian-leather-clad mountain bike shoes was not quite enough to get me to plunk down the cash. Instead I will spend $20 for some new inserts for my current Diadora pair.
